definition[0]: a height above the level of the sea
example[0]: The road climbs steadily to an elevation of 1,400 feet.
definition[1]: an act of moving someone to a more important rank or position
example[1]: her sudden elevation to international stardom
definition[2]: an increase in the amount or level of something
example[2]: a sudden elevation of blood pressure
definition[3]: an upright side of a building, as shown in a drawing done by an architect (=person who plans buildings)
example[3]: the front elevation of a house
definition[4]: the angle made with the horizon by pointing a gun
example[4]: The cannon was fired at an elevation of 60 degrees.
